contexts.context: ...Sil the Teacher. The poetry is simple and <mark>dramatic</mark>, lyric and personal, composed to be sung...
...Morrowind from Dagoth Ur, and concealing a recent <mark>dramatic</mark> diminishing of the Tribunal's magical powers.
